title: Mint tea = Le The la menthe
brief_description: A young man sits on the terrace of a Montparnasse cafe, watching the other patrons as they meet friends, enjoy a drink, flirt, or sit waiting. His own loneliness becomes increasingly apparent against this background of other people, with whom he cannot communicate. French language with some English.
